column7: The following statement contains a magic number: if (basket_contains_an_item_for(product))              {                  var item_quantity = get_item_for(product).quantity()                  .add(new Quantity(1));                  if (item_quantity.contains_more_than(new Quantity(50)))                      throw new ApplicationException(                      "You can only purchase 50 of a single product.");                  else                      get_item_for(product).increase_item_quantity_by(                      new Quantity(1));              }              else                  _items.Add(BasketItemFactory.create_item_for(product' this));
